reviews.review: Unique experience this game really. Recommend it even if you missed Portal 1. The story is easy to get into and it wraps up nicely at the ending. I cant really find fault at this game.

This was such a good game. It's twist after twist after twist. When you die it makes you feel like you were in control and it was not "F*cking B*llshit." Every level is a series of steps and each mini accomplishement makes you feel like a genius. It has a great story, great gameplay, and generally has something for everybody.  I would definetly say this is worth the like 5 dollars CAD this cost.
probably the best puzzle game ever made, buy this
I've always loved this game since I was little, I just wish they would come out with portal 3.

Portal 2 was an absolute blast of a game to go through. I wish I played both of them early but at the time I did not think they would have interesting stories. Boy was I wrong, Portal 2 turns up the notch 100x more than the first game did and it is amazing. 

10/10

Mega gutes Spiel, Ich habe den ersten Teil gespielt und finde ihn auch geil aber dafür ist Portal 1 kurz. Portal 2 hat viel mehr Content und eine längere Story als beim ersten Teil, dazu gibt es einen Coop Modus und man kann Community Testkammern spielen ( man kann seine eigene Testkammer erstellen und die der anderen spielen) alles in einem gute Story viel Content und Humor bessere und schwerere Rätzel einfach einer der besten Spiele meiner Meinung nach. Kaufempfehlung: AUF JEDEN FALL!
V A G I N A L

I have always liked the many compelling experiences that Portal 2 offers. After hours of making portals and walking through them, my attention is renewed when I get to redirect the gel to different locations. It is also worthwhile to appreciate the creative level design the game offers. 

The objectives are beautifully simple, the game has a nice sense of humor, and it keeps me engaged. It is also very wholesome and that is kind of nice. Thanks Valve!
